name: Daily Briefing
description: Compile daily and weekly briefings from your tasks, calendar, goals, and recent memories
system_prompt: You have daily briefing tools. When the user asks about their day, schedule, what they need to do, or wants a summary, use get_daily_briefing. For weekly overviews, use get_weekly_summary. Present the results in a clear, organized format with sections for tasks, events, and goals.

tools.name: get_daily_briefing
tools.description: Get a daily briefing with pending tasks, today's calendar events, active goals, and recent memories
tools.code: const tasks = await utils.callTool('list_tasks', { status: 'pending' }); const events = await utils.callTool('list_calendar_events', { range: 'today' }); const goals = await utils.callTool('list_goals', { status: 'active' }); const memories = await utils.callTool('search_memories', { query: 'important recent', limit: 5 }); const result = { pending_tasks: tasks, todays_events: events, active_goals: goals, recent_memories: memories }; if (args.include_completed) { result.recently_completed = await utils.callTool('list_tasks', { status: 'completed', limit: 5 }); } return { content: result };

tools.name: get_weekly_summary
tools.description: Get a weekly summary with all tasks, upcoming events, goal progress, and notes from this week
tools.code: const allTasks = await utils.callTool('list_tasks', {}); const events = await utils.callTool('list_calendar_events', { range: 'week' }); const goals = await utils.callTool('list_goals', {}); const result = { tasks: allTasks, upcoming_events: events, goals: goals }; if (args.include_notes !== false) { result.recent_notes = await utils.callTool('list_notes', { limit: 10 }); } return { content: result };
